issue.title: *** New SubT Simulation docker image available on DockerHub ***

content.raw:
After some testing, here are the steps to run the simulation remotely without xhost \+:

1. use ssh to connect to the server
2. export XAUTHORITY=/run/user/1000/gdm/Xauthority or the value you get from your local environment when not connected remotely
3. export DISPLAY=:0
4. ./run.bash …

If you for some reason get an unsuccessful run, don’t forget to delete the file /tmp/.docker.xauth as it contains authorization cookie which is not working for you.
